sources.title: Adorable
sources.description: Title: Adorable Summary: Janet Gaynor plays a rebellious princess who must try to marry the man she loves, instead of the stuffy old prince her parents want her to marry. But will this ordinary man love her back ... Directed by: William Dieterle Actors: Janet Gaynor, Henri Garat, C. Aubrey Smith Production Company: Fox Film Corporation Release Date: 19 May 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Janet Gaynor plays a rebellious princess who must try to marry the man she loves, instead of the stuffy old prince her parents want her to marry. But will this ordinary man love her back once he finds out she's a princess?

metadata.Plot: Janet Gaynor plays a rebellious princess who must try to marry the man she loves, instead of the stuffy old prince her parents want her to marry. But will this ordinary man love her back once he finds out she's a princess?
metadata.Writer: Paul Frank, Billy Wilder, George Marion Jr.
